title: Menu, "Restaurant Bellevues: Menu", ca. 1985–90
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Recto: Just below the top third, centered, Bellevues is stamped in gilt script.
Views of the verso are visible whtough the transparent material.

Verso: Menu offering are imprinted on the left and right halves in lower-case black type within six categories, which are imprinted in lower-case script. Prices, in italicized numbers, are listed to the left of the offerings. A view of the recto is visible on the left through the transparent material.

The acetate is bound in black faux leather, trimmed in metallic gilt corners, recto and verso.

tombstone.epitaph:
Menu, "Restaurant Bellevues: Menu", ca. 1985–90.
ca. 1985–90. Acetate, faux leather, metallic gilt. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-278.
